DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety efficacy etanercept comparison placebo double-blind , parallel , randomized fashion subject idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis ( IPF ) fail previous therapy . The treatment period 1 year . The primary objective evaluation safety efficacy . Secondary : The secondary objective evaluate quality life ( QoL ) pharmacokinetics ( PK ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety Efficacy Etanercept Patients With Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis IPF base American Thoracic Society ( ATS ) guideline Subjects endstage Previous treatment etanercept TNF antagonist ( eg , TNF monoclonal antibody soluble TNFreceptor ) Receipt investigational drug biological agent within 4 week screen visit
